replies.body: What's this no Krepo?
Really keen to see the EU LCS casting crew in Melbourne! But where's Deficio? :O
so what im hearing is  Atlus and Quickshot need to have a 1v1 to decide who has the best hair
Yes! I would like to see this.
Winner gets to decide the loser's haircut? I'm on board, let's see if the guys accept!

> I've never been to Australia and I've heard amazing things about the League community over there.

How much did Riot pay you to say that?
Just watch out for the "man eatting spiders"

And how 6 of the top 10 most venomous snakes in the world are native to Australia

And we are those 6 snakes, because we're toxic as fuck.
why do i want to listen to them in Australia get some local callers in to do the calls and i might watch but wont be watching them
Careful... they might hire Eddie 'Everywhere' McGuire!

Hey dude, 

If you scroll to the end there are local casters on the team already. EG  Max ‘Atlus’ Anderson, Julian ‘Pastrytime’ Carr, Zack ‘Rusty’ Pye and Jake ‘Spawn’ Tiberi will be casting side-by-side with the EU LCS crew
I volunteer as a local caster <3 xoxo
One does not simply hear "amazing things" about the Australian league community.

“Really looking forward to working some of the awesome talent from the EU team, right before we wreck them on the Rift!” Pastrytime

Does this mean that there will be a 5v5 Casters Showmatch? Have Froskurinn come down and play as well? I think that would be awesome. Maybe even have the players casting?

best yasu
~~~~
hehe
My thoughts exactly! The only thing that amazes me is when there is actually a nice person!
i'll take that as a joke? the community is absolutely shit in OCE xD
why no deficio, not watching
No Krepo...? #BringKrepo
i guess the editor hates sjokz
EH EU castors are the worst... give me Korean, LCK or OCE or USA any day!

Where is KREPO!!! and DEFICIO!!! 

nope not watching

Sjokz, I can only hope for your sake that you encounter these mysterious 'amazing' community members and don't get stuck listening to immature twats telling you to get back in the kitchen, commenting on your looks like it's some kind of competition or suggesting you know nothing about games because you have a vagina...
